CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 3, 1953, pg. 9 reads: "Invitations Committee...for the second annual Debutante Cotillion, given by Alpha Kappa Alpha sorors at Syria Mosque, Jan. 5, include these charming sorors. Left to right: Mary Hall, Vicky Hargon, Edna Garrison, chairman; Virginia W. Thomas, Lois S Curry and Zerbie D. Swain. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of six Alpha Kappa Alpha members, from left: Mary Hall, Vicky Hargon, Edna Garrison, Virginia W. Thomas, Lois S Curry, and Zerbie D. Swain, gathered on dark sofa with light colored fringed trim, in living room with round two toned ottoman and striped wallpaper
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Living rooms--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Living room furniture--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority.Hall, Mary.Hargon, Victoria.
